resources.string: Icon made by Faithtoken under CC BY 3.0 with no changes.
Tap the card to reveal one criteria. \nIf not enough, tap again. \nCheck the family mode for naive criterias.
Click on the button below to make a choice!
You are using the full mode. To play with kids, your parents or your boss we recommend activating the family mode.
